title: Teacher competency enhancement program for entrepreneurial learning environment design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of pedagogy and language education experience
context.additional_context: Project-based course enabling pre-service teachers to observe entrepreneurial learning theories and apply them to actual classroom settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain creativity-promoting strategies by analyzing entrepreneurial learning design principles.
Learners can evaluate decision-support elements in teacher-child interactions through observational research.
Learners can develop PBL projects that simulate entrepreneurial learning environments using digital tools.
Learners can propose entrepreneurial learning models suitable for language education contexts based on project outcomes.

resources: Early Childhood Education Field Observation Video Materials

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
